title: Game is actually unplayable
body:
The bug where it randomly alt-tabs out when you haven't actually pressed alt-tab makes the game unplayable. Wasn't happening before the last patch, so the obvious solution is to revert the patch. Anyone want to guess the likelihood of rotroi actually doing that? Hint: it's zero. I don't recall a patch having ever actually been reverted, even when it literally breaks the game.

Thanks for the free loss last game, Rito. It was fun going into a crucial late-game teamfight, having the game nope.jpg outta there, and then hearing "EnEmY pEnTaKiLL" before I can alt-tab back in because damage is still that high. I can't wait to play all your other fully quality assured games with thoroughly tested patches with no regressions. Just kidding; you don't know what any of those words mean.
